identity.name: SoundMirror
identity.tagline: See the Sound. Master the Speech.
identity.target_audience: Deaf/Mute individuals, Speech Therapy patients, Language Learners

core_principles: Accessibility First: Visual cues replace audio. High contrast is non-negotiable.
The Mirror Effect: The UI is a reflection of the user's potential voice. Clean, distortion-free.
Anatomical Clarity: No cartoons. Precise, medical-grade sprite visualization.
Fluid Feedback: Instant visual response to input (text or voice).
anti_patterns: No 'Talking Head' avatars (uncanny valley). Use schematic/medical sprites.
No distracting decorative gradients in the practice area.
No hidden navigation. Everything must be explicit.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(56,189,248,0.3)] transition-all duration-300

cards.default: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm hover:border-primary/30 transition-colors

inputs.default: bg-background border-input focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/50 focus:border-primary transition-all

SpriteAnimator.description: The core visualization component. Renders two synchronized images (Front/Side).
SpriteAnimator.style: relative aspect-square bg-black/20 rounded-2xl overflow-hidden border border-white/10 shadow-inner

PhonemeTimeline.description: Horizontal scrollable timeline showing phonemes in sequence.
PhonemeTimeline.style: flex gap-2 overflow-x-auto py-4 px-2 scrollbar-hide mask-linear-fade

WaveformVisualizer.style: w-full h-24 bg-black/40 rounded-lg border border-white/5

accessibility.contrast: Ensure WCAG AA compliance (4.5:1) for all text.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible 2px ring offset-2 ring-primary for all interactive elements.
accessibility.aria: All custom controls must have appropriate aria-labels and roles.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Theme Setup: Update tailwind.config.js to use the specific 'Medical Dark' palette defined above.
2. Layout: Implement the 'Bento' grid for the Home page using the defined grid classes.
3. Components: Use Shadcn UI for standard elements (Buttons, Cards, Dialogs). Create custom components for the SpriteAnimator and PhonemeTimeline.
4. State Management: Ensure the 'Practice' page state (current frame, playing status) is lifted or managed via context to synchronize the dual views.
5. Offline Capability: Ensure all assets (sprites) are locally referenceable or cached. Do not rely on external CDNs for core functionality.
6. Testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (e.g., 'play-button', 'record-button', 'phoneme-card').
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry and grids.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for overlays.
